_header: A holy confessor thou were one
Subjects: Francis of Assisi, saint, prayer to; saints, prayers to
_description: John Audelay, An Orison to St Francis — thirteen quatrains (aaab) and burden: ‘Saynt frances to þe I say / Saue þi breder boþ nyȝt & day’

BodDou302.First Lines:
A hole confessoure þou were hone& leuydist in
                    contemplacoun…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…ffore I mad hit with wepyng eyeȝour broder iou þe
                    blynd awdlay
BodDou302.Attributed Author: ȝour broder iou þe blynd awdlay
